sharePhoneNumberConsent: Would you like to provide us with your phone number?
housingType: What type of housing do you live in?
rentRange: Where on the range does your rent fall?
roomsCount: How many rooms are in your home?
residentsCount: How people live in your home?
COVID19KnowledgeLevel: What is your knowledge level of COVID?
primaryInformationSource: What is your source of staying informed? (Select all that apply)
socialMediaQuestion: What social media do you use?
COVID19PreventionMeasures: What actions have you taken to prevent COVID-19? (Select all that apply)
reduceContacts: Reduce or eliminate physical contacts with people outside of their household
noPreventionMeasures: I am taking no measures currently
nationalHotlineAwareness: Are you aware of the national COVID-19 Hotline?
reasonsForNotUsingNationalHotline: Why are you not using it?
disabilityTypes: What type of disability(ies) do you have?
currentSymptoms: Which of the following symptoms are you currently experiencing? (Select all that apply)
gustatoryOrOlfactoryImpairment: Loss or reduced sense of taste or smell
hasBeenTestedForCOVID19: Have you been tested for COVID-19?
COVID19TestReferenceNumber: Please enter your test's reference number
COVID19TestResult: What was the result of the test?
reasonsForNotBeingTested: Why have you not been tested?
closeContactWithInfectedOrSymptomaticPer: Have you been in contact with anyone who has tested positive for COVID-19 or shown COVID-19 like symptoms?
cityTransportationMethod: How do you get around the city?
recentTravelOutsideDistrict: Have you ever traveled outside of the district within the last 7 days?
tripsOutsideDistricCount: How many journeys have you made?
reasonForTripsOutsideDistrict: What was the reason? (Select all that apply)
districtsVisited: What districts did you travel to?
mobilityRestrictions: What challenges exist within your environment that restrict your mobility?
deathsWithinHousehold: Has anyone died in the household?
deceasedComorbidities: Comorbidities of deceased if known (Select all that apply)
deceasedSymptoms: What were the symptoms they experienced prior to death?
deceasedHadDisability: Does the deceased have any disabilities?
supportRequiredForCOVID19RiskManagement: What support do you require to control the risk of COVID-19?
householdNeeds: What are the household's needs at this time?
followupConsent: Are you okay with us following up with you?
followupVisitConsent: Are you okay with us coming back to the house?
